articles.content: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services formally announced Tuesday afternoon that it has finalized its calendar 2021 physician pay rule, which cuts physical and occupational therapy payments… [+5812 chars]

articles.author: Parija Kavilanz, CNN Business
articles.title: Sephora is opening up mini shops inside Kohl's stores - CNN
articles.description: Sephora is set to open mini shops inside Kohl's stores, with the first 200 locations debuting in fall of 2021. It's part of an effort to reach more customers outside the mall.

articles.author: Investor's Business Daily
articles.title: Updated Airbnb IPO Filing Sets Pricing Range With $35 Billion Valuation - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: The Airbnb IPO plans to raise $2.5 billion with an initial public offering that will price shares in the range of $44 to $50.
